data: The Thing (lyrics)</br></br>in front of your eyes</br>just this song and 3 men</br>no idea before their coming </br>no idea inside your head</br></br>just a little thing</br>that bring them power </br>some alcohol in your head</br>a little bottle </br></br>the thing</br></br>now i understand</br>with this guitar and this riff</br>am i beginning insane</br>that’s not blues isn’t it</br></br>these 3 men </br>that are used to drink whisky</br>they bring metal in your head</br>due to </br></br>the thing</br></br>the thing
